text: ekak awith passe ahanawa

min anathuruwa jathika prathignyawa sawibala ganwamin eya ratathula prayogikawa kriyathmaka kirima sandaha madhya kalina ha dingukalina wadapiliwelak nirmanaya karana bawada champika ranawaka mahatha pawasayi.
sirage kamare hamadama kiyewwata kament ekak pala karanna hithila na.
me ek ek jala prabhawayan bhauthika, rasayanika ha jaiwiya gunanga wiwidha wana athara idiri wagu mangin ema jala prabhawayange gunathmaka bhawayan wisthara kara atha.
kathawa kimata pera kamaran yanu kawaraku dayi obata kiya dima mage yuthukamayi.
inpasuwa eki idam rejistrar karyalaya wetha gos oppuwa liyu nothariswarayage nama, dinaya, oppu ankaya yana wisthara laba di sahathika pitapathak illum kala hakiya.

pahatha rupa palamu satahanen penwa aththe lokaye ek ek ratawala janagahanayen dahasakata sitina le dan dennan pramanayayi.
dambaulla gana thorathuru nathiwa ee gana wiwaranayak kirimela mama apohosath wemi.
oya aapu praposal eka rijek karapu ekama athi.

ehi athithaya sinhala jathikathwaya jathika wyaparaya thama deshapalanaya sandaha yoda gath deshapalanagnyayan kara diwa yanawa. 2009n pasu jathika wyaparaya ee deshapalanikaranaye prathipalayak lesa mahinda wisin meheyawanu labuwa. 2009 nandikadal jayagrahanaya mayi wiswani da ma apata ahimi wuna.

uda wisi wemin ehi kilomitar kipayak gaman kirima apata sinawata karunak wiya.

ohuta masikawa rupiyal laksha ekahamaraka watupak gewanawa.
gruha jiwithaya thula iwasilimathwa ha buddhimathwa katayuthu kirima wadagath wenawa.mema kalaya thula manasika sahanaya adu wenawa.sithata warin wara kalakirim athiwiya hakiyi.

dinkak eyath ekkath hondin inna balanna..

shishyathwa kadaim lakunu nikuth kere.
obe mathayata wiruddha wenawaya kiyanne mamath ehema kenek nam karannama ooneda?

nidahas ha sadharana parlimenthu mathiwaranayak pawathwima sandaha mita pera mathiwaranawaladi anugamanaya nokala kriyamarga kihipayak ma brahaspathinda (8) pawathwena mathiwaranaye di kriyathmaka kirimata niyamitha bawa mathiwarana aaranchi marga kiyayi.chandaya salakunu kirima sandaha methek bhawitha kala pansala wenuwata panak yoda ganima ewani wadagathma kriyamargayak bawa mathiwarana maha lekam karyalayiya prakashakayek kiya.chanda dinaye udasana chanda salakunu kirimata pera chanda pola niyojithayanta awashyanam chanda pettiya athulatha stikarayak alawima sandaha da mathiwarana komasariswaraya ekanga wimada thawath kriyamargayaki.
rakiyawak nathiwa unath ara kiyapu nidi marana job eken ayin una.

methana me siddhiya baluwoth kiyanna thiyenne andumath athuluwa sthrithwaya ha paurushathwaya yana dekatama wen wenwa aawenika wana kriyakarakam haraha lingika awashyathawala galapimakuth swabhawayen athiwenawa wagema ee gana awabodhayakin ee siddhiyath ekka ekata jiwath wimata katath hakiyawak thibiyayuthuyi.

prajathanthrawadaya saha yahapalanaya sthapitha kirimata men ma sadharana samajayak nirmanaya kirimata saba bauddha prathipadawa anuwa katayuthu kala unwahanse ithamath suhadashiliwa apa asuru karamin rata, jathiya ha aagame abhiwruddhiya pinisa nithara awawada anushasana karamin ee sandaha awashya margopadeshakathwaya niranthara laba dun sangha pithruwarayaku wiya.

pradeshaye kethaya ?
ee watunata passe yam widihakata ehema wena pirimi gahanu degollantama mama me mokakda karanne kiyana prashneta muna denna siddha wenawa.

wiwidha hethun matha walikamam uthura pradeshaye nawatha padinchiwima sandaha methek nidahas kara nomathi idam akkara 6000 ka bhumi bhagayen kotasak nidahas kara ema pradeshawalin awathan wu janathawa nawatha padinchi kirima dina siyaya wada satahanehi palamu karyaya lesa sidu kirimata balaporoththu wana bawath, ee pilibandawa janadhipathi maithripala sirisena mahatha agramathya ranil wikramasinha mahatha samaga sakachcha kara awashya kriyamarga ganna bawa nawatha padinchikirima, prathisanskaranaya ha hindu aagamika katayuthu pilibanda amathya swaminadan mahatha kiya.

'rata wenuwen ekata sitimu' sanwardhana wadasatahan malawe thun wana adiyare ampara disthrik awasan pragathi samalochana raswima ada (11) janadhipathi maithripala sirisenage pradhanathwayen pawathwenawa.

samanya nawika hamudawata amathara kappal-padayi nawika hamuda kandaya satan waladi wisheshayen yodagena atha.
